name: Portal Knight
description:
Portal Knight

An action adventure to cut light through the darkness!

Controls
  • WASD - move
  • Left Click - attack
  • Right Click - AOE spell
  • Space - dash, advance dialogue
Credits

Inspired by Portal Knight by Ollie Hoff. Made by Allison and Thuleanx.

This was made as part of the <>. The music were from:

  • Dust by Tri-Tachyon, Starting Area Theme
  • Black Sun by Tausdei, Battle Theme
  • Dark Sky by Maou, Ending Theme
